sequencer_proxy.svProxy sequencer base class for sequence layering in UVM-ML

sequencer_proxy.sv

Proxy sequencer base class for sequence layering in UVM-ML

ml_seq

Base class for ML sequences.  Every sequence in the target framework that is initiated from this framework must be exported as a derived type from ml_seq.  For example:

class WRITE_TRANSFER extends ml_seq;
   rand bit[15:0] base_addr;
   rand int unsigned size;
   rand bit[63:0] data;

  `uvm_object_utils_begin(WRITE_TRANSFER)
    `uvm_field_int(base_addr, UVM_ALL_ON)
    `uvm_field_int(size, UVM_ALL_ON)
    `uvm_field_int(data, UVM_ALL_ON)
  `uvm_object_utils_end
  `uvm_declare_p_sequencer(ml_sequencer_proxy)

  function new(string name="WRITE_TRANSFER");
      super.new(name);
  endfunction

endclass : WRITE_TRANSFER
Summary
ml_seq
Base class for ML sequences.
Class Hierarchy
uvm_sequence
ml_seq
Class Declaration
class ml_seq extends uvm_sequence

ml_sequencer_proxy

Base class for UVM-ML sequencer proxy.  Instantiates the TLM ports and connects them to the target sequencer TLM interface.  Once connected to the target sequencer, one can send sequence items and start sequences on the target sequencer.  For example:

`uvm_do_with(xb_item, {addr == 'h1000;
         read_write == WRITE;
         size == 8;
         })
`uvm_do_with (wt_seq, {base_addr == target_addr;
               size == 4;})

Base class for UVM-ML sequencer proxy.

Variables
send_item_pnon-blocking TLM put port to send items to the sequencer TLM interface.
get_response_pblocking TLM get port to receive item response the sequencer TLM interface.
start_sequence_pblocking TLM put port to send sequences to the sequencer TLM interface.
start_seq_pblocking TLM transport to send items to the sequencer TLM interface.
save_itemsave the last item.
use_transportuse bi-directional interface to receive sequence result.
Methods
newConstructor instantiates the TLM ports.
phase_endedThe UVM-ML ports are registered at the end of the build phase.

send_requestSend an item to the target TLM interface.
update_done_itemUpdate the item from last collected response.
wait_for_item_doneWait for item done called by the sequencer after send_request.

non-blocking TLM put port to send items to the sequencer TLM interface.

blocking TLM get port to receive item response the sequencer TLM interface.

Update the item from last collected response.

wait_for_item_done

virtual task wait_for_item_done(uvm_sequence_base sequence_ptr,
int transaction_id)

Wait for item done called by the sequencer after send_request.

set_seqr_resp_off

function set_seqr_resp_off()

Use TLM put instead of transport to improve performance.  Use when no response is expected from sequence.

set_seqr_resp_on

function set_seqr_resp_on()

Use TLM transport instead of put.  Use when response is expected from sequence.

start_sequence

virtual task start_sequence(uvm_sequence_base e_seq)

Start a sequence in the target sequencer.
